(Simplified: 烩)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 會 indicates the sound; 火 (fire) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 火 [ huǒ ] fire, flame; to burn; anger, rage
    • 會 [ huì ] to assemble, to meet; meeting; association, group
①烹飪方法，炒菜後加少量的水和芡粉：燴蝦仁。燴豆腐。
②烹飪方法，把米飯等和葷菜、素菜混在一起加水煮：燴飯。燴餅。大雜燴。
燴飯 [ huì fàn ]: rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
燴麵 [ huì miàn ]: braised noodles; stewed noodles

燴字的基本解释

燴
huì
见“烩”。

燴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
“烩1”的繁体字。
(1)烹饪方法。菜炒熟后加芡粉拌和。
(2)烹饪方法。把饭和各种菜混合在一起烹煮。
(3)烹饪方法。把煮熟的饭食加油和水再煮。
(4)比喻把不相关的人和事拉扯在一起。

燴字的康熙字典解释

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huì］
Traditional Chinese characters for "餃1".
(1) Cooking method. After the vegetables are cooked, add the gorgon powder and mix.
(2) Cooking method. Cook rice and various dishes together.
(3) Cooking method. Add oil and water to the cooked meals before cooking.
(4) The metaphor pulls unrelated people and things together.
